name: Icy Peril
description:
In the thick snowscape %PERSON_NAME sees large and menacing footprints, still recent. Before %he could blink, behind %him has appeared the deadly Ice Drake, the lone king in these frigid lands. It is now life or death

Your agent has %HP hp.

choices.name: Bend To My Will
choices.description:
Through sheer might you can try to command this beast to bow down to you.

20% chance of failure (losing 4 hp)

choices.name: Law Low And Slink Away
choices.description: Flee from a potential fight with the ice drake
